name: Metronidazole

ingredients.name: CARBOMER HOMOPOLYMER TYPE C (ALLYL PENTAERYTHRITOL CROSSLINKED)

indications: metronidazole gel indicated topical application treatment inflammatory papules pustules rosacea .
contraindications: apply rub thin film metronidazole gel twice daily , morning evening , entire affected areas washing . areas treated cleansed application metronidazole gel . patients may cosmetics application metronidazole gel .
warningsAndPrecautions: metronidazole gel usp , 0.75 % supplied aluminum tubes containing : 5 g ndc 51672-4116-5 ( physician sample , tube ) 30 g ndc 51672-4116-2 45 g ndc 51672-4116-6
adverseReactions: metronidazole gel contraindicated individuals history hypersensitivity metronidazole , parabens , ingredients formulation .
indications_original: Metronidazole gel is indicated for topical application in the treatment of inflammatory papules and pustules of rosacea.
contraindications_original:
Apply and rub in a thin film of metronidazole gel twice daily, morning and evening, to entire affected areas after washing.
                  Areas to be treated should be cleansed before application of metronidazole gel. Patients may use cosmetics after application of metronidazole gel.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Metronidazole Gel USP, 0.75% is supplied in aluminum tubes containing:
                  5 g NDC 51672-4116-5 (physician sample, tube only) 
    30 g NDC 51672-4116-2 
    45 g NDC 51672-4116-6
adverseReactions_original: Metronidazole gel is contraindicated in individuals with a history of hypersensitivity to metronidazole, parabens, or other ingredients of the formulation.
